name: NEW! 8"x10"- Tree Made to Order
description: This is a smaller, more simplified version of my Family Tree. Custom-made for your family, this original piece of art will feature a branch for each family member, along with a banner at the top of the tree for the Family Surname. This tree does not include symbols or background scenes. Completion time is approx 3 days. Shipping only within the U.S.

name: Story Tree Gift Certificates
description: Spring Sale!! Now through 4/30...$75.00 off all Gift Certificates! Sale is reflected in the listing price. Give the gift of a Story Tree. Available for 3, 4 & 5-Generations. This is for a 3-Generation Tree and includes a background scene. Gift Certificate is printed on recycled cardstock and will be shipped to your home or business via Priority Mail.

name: 5-Generation Hand Illustrated Family Tree
description:
5-Generation Tree: $475.
 
*Two sets of grandparents are shown in the roots, 
*The featured couple is on the trunk 
*Their adult children, adult grandchildren, great-grandchildren and special pets are in the branches above.
*Symbols representing the family's interests are scattered throughout.
*Includes a background scene.

*This piece is a 14"x17" graphite pencil drawing on Bristol. 
*Final piece wil be sprayed with a fixative to prevent smudging.
*The piece will be float matted on a 16"x20" matboard. The color is a black-brown shade that works with both black and wood frames.
 
Feel free to write me regarding custom orders.

Upon ordering, I will collect info. As work progresses, I will email pics for you to see and upon completion, but prior to shipping, you will receive a series of close-ups for your review. 
I prefer to ship express or overnight mail to reduce "handling" time along the postal route.

* Have a special date you would like this for? Message me for availability or rush orders.
Otherwise, please allow 4 weeks for completion. If I have no current orders to complete, your tree can be completed in 2 weeks.

Any questions, feel free to message me.

Most of my business is by word-of-mouth. For reviews and photos of past work, please visit my website: http://www.story-tree.com or my Facebook page.

name: 3- Generation Hand Illustrated Family Tree
description:
Whimsical custom-illustrated Family Tree proven to be a wonderful gift! 

3-Generation Family Tree:
 
*Two sets of grandparents are shown in the roots, 
*The featured couple is on the trunk 
*Their children and special pets are in the branches above.
*Symbols representing the family's interests are scattered throughout.

*Background features a family home or favorite vacation spot.

*This piece is a 14"x17" graphite pencil drawing on Bristol. Final piece will be sprayed with a fixative to help prevent smudging. 

*The piece will be float-matted on a 16"x20" matboard.  

**See my other listing for 4-Generation Trees.
**Custom trees and rush orders can also be discussed.

Upon ordering, I will collect info. As work progresses, I will email pics for you to see and upon completion, but prior to shipping, you will receive a series of close-ups for your review. 
Item will ship flat, in a secure package of cardboard and bubble wrap. I like to send via overnight or Express mail to reduce the time it is being "handled" on the postal route. 

* Have a special date you would like this for? Message me for the current turnaround time. Otherwise, please allow 4-6 weeks. 

Any questions, feel free to message me. Also visit: http://www.story-tree.com.

Thank you for visiting The Story Tree!


Although the buyer will own the commissioned piece, the copyright is retained by the artist.
